summary: Elvira's blender tells her story with her husband, Onofre, who's gone missing, and makes reflections about life.
cast: Ana Lúcia Torre|Germano Haiut|Selton Mello|Fabiula Nascimento|Gorete Milagres|Zécarlos Machado|Aramis Trindade|Marcos Cesana|Eduardo Sofiatti|Gillray Coutinho|Francisco Gaspar|Sidney Santiago
title: Reflexões de um Liquidificador
